data.name: Seance: The Unquiet (Preview)
data.detailed_description:
In a house haunted by the past, a family confronts a tragedy not forgotten. You will experience their fate for yourself when you enter the world of Séance: The Unquiet coming in 2017 from Holospark.

This dramatic new VR experience uses a combination of the Unreal videogame engine and the latest in Hollywood-style performance-capture technology to weave a frightening and intriguing tale that blends cinematic storytelling with subtle interactivity.

Séance is a ghost story full of character, drama, scares, and surprises which uses the immersive power of interactive virtual reality to put you inside the story in a way you won’t forget.

You look ready. Let's begin.

FREE PREVIEW

This five-minute preview of Séance: The Unquiet works with the Oculus Rift and HTC Vive VR headsets. No controllers are required. We hope you enjoy this advance look at the world of Séance!

data.short_description: Get a sneak preview of Séance: The Unquiet, an immersive VR ghost story coming in 2017.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
